ygData.subject: RE: Sheet Metal
ygData.msgSnippet: Where do you get blue ore? =) and what do you do after 175? ... From: Bryan G Hardy [mailto:bhardy@magicnet.net] Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 4:55 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Where do you get blue ore? =)
and what do you do after 175?

-----Original Message-----
From: Bryan G Hardy [mailto:bhardy@...]
Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 4:55 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Sheet Metal


From: "Bryan G Hardy" <bhardy@...>

Aye, we can make sheets... same way as detailed in the book. We cannot,
however, make folded sheets... Now, I've heard rumors galore, but the
one that seems to keep turning up the most is that we will not be able to
forge folded sheets until the expansion comes out, which seriously pisses me
off.

BTW, Banded will only take you to 175 skill.

Also, has anyone played with the Blue Ore yet? I tried a couple
combinations,
one brick one flask, and then two bricks one flask, no combine on both
attempts. If anyone has had any success, please let me know. Otherwise
I assume that this end product has been "administratively broken" just as
the folded sheets are.

Lord Joror Ironfrost
High Shaman of Halas
Master Blacksmith - 175 skill
Mithaniel Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: mbutler <mbutler@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 5:31 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Sheet Metal


> From: "mbutler" <mbutler@...>
